ISSUE.TITLE: Remove Autofac, or allow a setting for it not to be used.
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.40.x Steps to reproduce the problem: Please remove Autofac from future releases, or allow a setting for it not to be used by those that can afford the extra memory usage that resulted in reverting back to AutoFac. I'm using 4.40.1, with everything from 4.40.3 (apart from autofac #5586 & 'Changed sql data provider') applied, and the difference in performance under load is enormous. I'm not going to post any load tests, as I'm sure you're fed up with me doing that ;)' ----------------- See https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/issues/5688 for the initial discussion

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #5701 Added possibility to choose between Autofac and .Net IoC containers
